review: This is too good product from Google and made my life easy.
author: Ganesh

review: Works well on apps that offer it. Feel it is very limited by this but great if what you want to watch is partnered with them
author: john dickinson

review: Lovely.  This works as advertised.  It comes with a USB powertransformer (not pictured) as well so you're good to go.  It'svery nice to use it to cast Pandora music or Youtube videos.
author: Cameron

review: Didnt work as expected. The pictures were fuzzy and there was a huge lag between the video on my laptop and the one on the TV. Maybe my network speed isn't sufficient although I think I have a good wifi system from Comcast.Also I have a Roku which does almost the same job and more.
author: EKPK

review: Amazing product it works very fast and smoothly
author: Dylan Theodore

review: LOVE the fact I can watch past TV shows from my computer.  So much easier than Times Warner on demand!

review: Excellent device perfect to use with android devices, youtube, netflix, chrome etc
